title: Darkin Lore (@Rioters)
body: Hey, was just wondering if with the Aatrox rework proposed in [this article](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/ask-riot-trust-question-and-aatrox), if we might be getting some expansion of the lore of the Darkin, and maybe therefore more on the history of the Rune Wars. Or perhaps it'll change the origins of Aatrox entirely? At the moment, it's sort of shrouded by the mists of time, and as a Lore enthusiast, I would love to know what happened to the rest of the Darkin. Presently, Aatrox's lore states that there are 5 Darkin, 2 of which are known to the people of Runeterra: Aatrox, and another unnamed Darkin. Are all 5 of these Darkin the same Gods of War that Aatrox is, or do they all have different demonic attributes? Answers would be wonderful, but I understand if you can't express anything this early in the piece.
